name: Blacksmith Apprentice
description: The village blacksmith seeks a capable apprentice
to help with the growing demand for weapons and tools.
Learn the basics of smithing and prove

objectives.deliver_weapons: Deliver Weapons to the Guard Captain

dialogs.start1: Ah, you look strong enough for smithing work!
dialogs.start2: I need someone to help with the orders piling up.
dialogs.start3: Learn the craft well, and there's good coin in it.
dialogs.progress1: Good work! Your technique is improving.
dialogs.progress2: Keep practicing and you'll be a fine smith.
dialogs.complete1: Excellent! You've proven yourself as an apprentice.
